author: pjamesburwell
body:
This works too, and even from UNC path:
`Import-Module -Verbose C:\PSPrivateGallery\Modules\PSGallery`

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: I'm not really sure what the problem is here? Need more info; if you could, please fill out the standard issue template with all the details you have. 😄

title: UNC Path works with Import-Module
